TITLE: Bacchus
DESCRIPTION: Bacchus's famous painting by Michelangelo Merisi, (Caravaggio), 1571-1610
SUBJECTS: Characters: Bacchus. Clothing: Classic. Attributes: (Bacchus) crown of vine leaves and grapes; cup of wine. Interior. Objects: cushion; decanter; ribbon; cloth; majolica crepe. Vegetables: figs; apples; peaches; grapes; pears; pomegranates; chestnuts; fig leaves; grape vine leaves; citrus leaves
CONTENT: Bacchus wearing a cloth, a crown of wine and surrounded by vegetables, including grapes.
